description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Rapala® Pro Bass Fishing brings you into the world of professional bass tournaments with hair-raising angling action. Launch your bass boat onto seven of North America’s top freshwater lakes, pull in the heaviest catch and blow away your competition at the final weigh-in. Arm yourself with real Rapala® lures and cast it, crank it and catch it across 20+ tournament events. Do you have what it takes to fish against the pros?
